pullrequest.title: Components Part 6: use ign-cmake1 and components for av, events, graphics

content.raw: You could set `IGN_MATH_VER` to `ignition-math5_VERSION_MAJOR`. While it doesn't avoid having a `5` in there again it clarifies how they are connected and when searching for `ignition-math` in the future this line will also match and therefore less likely be forgotten.
content.html: You could set IGN_MATH_VER to ignition-math5_VERSION_MAJOR. While it doesn't avoid having a 5 in there again it clarifies how they are connected and when searching for ignition-math in the future this line will also match and therefore less likely be forgotten.
